metadata.lecture_topic: Вычисли v_t в Momentum: γ=0.9, v_{t-1}=1, ∇L=2, η=0.1.

turns.content: Вычисли v_t в Momentum: γ=0.9, v_{t-1}=1, ∇L=2, η=0.1.

turns.model_response:
To compute \( v_t \) using the momentum optimizer with \( \gamma = 0.9 \), \( v_{t-1} = 1 \), \( \nabla L = 2 \), and \( \eta = 0.1 \):

\[
v_t = \beta \cdot v_{t-1} - \alpha \cdot \nabla L
\]

Plugging in the values:

\[
v_t = 0.9 \times 1 - 0.1 \times 2 = 0.9 - 0.2 = 0.7
\]

**Answer:** \( v_t = 0.7 \)
